Shivah::

"I like to speak about our problem... " said Shivah "But I have to 
solve some details before" Shivah typed some buttons and Blaze with 
Silver scout were locked down and insolated, in that way that the 
virus couldnt spread out side the area where they were.

"Bullet"said Shivah By comm link "I need your help. I promise you a 
lot fun, 'cause we have a annoying bot in our territory and you could 
have the chance to destroy him, follow my signal"

"Now my dear Panzer"said Shivah while he looked to the maximal "It's 
time for your reprogramation process... Come my brothers, Kit kat and 
Drillbit"

Shivah walked to the labs, while Luzbel (With Panzer in arms) and 
attila follow him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He nodded to Shivah.
> "Yes, we will need time to hunt them down and fight."
